display_help: Lanaru can summon a massive Lightning Storm overhead that will strike any foe that approaches the Witch Doctor. Lightning Bolts from this storm can knock down and damage all foes near the strike, and can cause panic. Lightning Bolts will continue to strike for the lifetime of the storm.
